author: IGN
description: A misfit group of unwitting high school students stumble upon a cursed object, an ancient Aztec Death Whistle. They discover that blowing the whistle and the terrifying sound it emits will summon their future deaths to hunt them down. As the body count rises, the friends investigate the origins of the deadly artifact in a desperate effort to stop the horrifying chain of events that they have set in motion.
title: Whistle - Official Trailer (2026) Dafne Keen, Nick Frost

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Microsoft has announced Wave 1 of its January Xbox Game Pass titles, and there are a few heavy hitters. Star Wars: Outlaws, Warhammer 40K: Space Marine, and Resident Evil Village are headlining the service. Resident Evil is particularly timely, considering Requiem drops next month. In other news, PlayStation has patented a new AI Assists feature that can take over if you're stuck in a game. The model can be trained on previous playing sessions or from clips posted to YouTube and Twitch, and can player progress on a granular level in order to understand what they're trying to achieve. And finally, Nvidia has introduced DLSS 4.5, with improved image quality and 6x multi-frame generation. Over 400 titles already support DLSS 4.5 and it will be available in GeForce driver update 591.74.
title: Xbox Announces First Game Pass Lineup of 2026 - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Here's a look at the Console Announcement Trailer for 2XKO, a free-to-play fighting game developed by Riot Games. Players will take on opponents in 2v2 showdowns with powerful abilities and refined tag-team mechanics. 2XKO is launching with Season 1 on January 20 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S, with the game being available now in Early Access for PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: 2XKO - Official Console Announcement Trailer

Players will get the rundown on the narrative leading up to the events of the game, as a simple man falls in love with a woman named Juliet, which inevitably ends in tragedy as poetic history entails. Romeo is a Dead Man launches on February 11 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

Players can unlock the Capcom Sports Club in the Game Center to attain Premium Rewards, such as new EX colors for Rashid and E. Honda, baseball gear for avatars, and more. The Fighter Sports Meet Fighting Pass is available now for Street Fighter 6 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Official Trailer 2 for Cosmic Princess Kaguya!, a music-driven anime film distributed by Netflix. Embark on an adventure through the thrills and tribulations of the tale of Princess Kaguya told like never before in Cosmic Princess Kaguya!, streaming exclusively on Netflix on January 22.

Tsukuyomi is a virtual realm where hopes and dreams come together. Iroha Sakayori, a 17-year-old high school student in Tokyo, leads an extremely busy life trying to balance part-time work and academics. She finds peace by watching a popular streamer named Yachiyo Runami, who is the administrator of an online virtual space called Tsukuyomi.

Iroha frequents Tsukuyomi, where people can live different lives and freely pursue their creativity, and she passes the time by supporting Yachiyo and playing battle games to earn a little extra money.

On her way home one day, Iroha finds a telephone pole shining with iridescent hues. To her surprise, an adorable baby emerges from the pole. Unable t
title: Cosmic Princess Kaguya! - Official Trailer 2 (2026) Jeannie Tirado, Dawn Bennett, Ryan Bartley

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'On Community' Update Full Presentation for NVIDIA GeForce, the groundbreaking technology company in gaming, AI, and more. Players can get the rundown on the updates coming from NVIDIA as presented at CES 2026, covering games, apps, and features for gamers and creators alike. Get extended looks at Phantom Blade Zero, 007 First Light, Resident Evil Requiem, alongside the upcoming technology on the way, including DLSS 4.5 Super Resolution, 6X Dynamic Multi Frame Gen, and more.

Source: https://youtube.com/nvidia
title: NVIDIA GeForce - Official 'On Community' Update Full Presentation | CES 2026

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Official Trailer for The Death of Robin Hood, an action-adventure drama film distributed by A24. Witness Robin Hood on the brink of oblivion and an offering of another chance in The Death of Robin Hood, coming to theaters in 2026.

Grappling with his past after a life of crime and murder, Robin Hood finds himself gravely injured after a battle he thought would be his last. In the hands of a mysterious woman, he is offered a chance at salvation.

The Death of Robin Hood stars Hugh Jackman, Bill Skarsgard, Jodie Comer, Noah Jupe, Murray Bartlett, Faith Delaney, Tabitha Smyth, and more. The film is directed and written by Michael Sarnoski.

The Death of Robin Hood is coming to theaters in 2026.

#IGN #DeathOfRobinHood #RobinHood
title: The Death of Robin Hood - Official Trailer (2026) Hugh Jackman, Bill Skarsgard, Jodie Comer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Get Tickets' Trailer for Send Help, a darkly comedic psychological thriller distributed by 20th Century Studios starring Rachel McAdams, Dylan O'Brien, Edyll Ismail, and more. Two unlikely colleagues must set aside their grievances to survive a deserted yet sinister island. Send Help is in theaters on January 30 with tickets available now.

Linda Liddle and Bradley Preston, two colleagues who find themselves stranded on a deserted island after they are the only survivors of a plane crash. On the island, they must overcome past grievances and work together to survive, but ultimately, it becomes an unsettling and darkly humorous battle of wills and wits to make it out alive. 

Send Help stars Rachel McAdams, Dylan O'Brien, Edyll Ismail, Dennis Haysbert, Xavier Samuel, Chris Pang, Thaneth Warakulnukroh, Emma Raimi, and more. The film is directed by Sam Raimi, alongside being executive produced by JJ Hook.

Send Help is in theaters on January 30 with tickets available now.
title: Send Help - Official 'Get Tickets' Trailer (2026) Rachel McAdams, Dylan O'Brien, Edyll Ismail

author: IGN
description:
Vanran is a fast-paced soulslike action game with adventure elements, centered around intense combat against massive, colossus-scale enemies – you could even say, Shadow of the Colossus-scale enemies, as you'll see in the trailer. A playable demo will be available on Steam from January 23-30, and you can wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3449370/VANRAN/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Vanran: Official Demo Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Stranger Things Chapter 2 Trailer for Dead by Daylight, an asymmetrical multiplayer action horror survival game developed by Behaviour Interactive. Players will experience the continuation of the hit Stranger Things Collaboration with Chapter 2, bringing new content straight from Hawkins. The Stranger Things Chapter 2 collaboration sees Eleven and Dustin being added as Survivors alongside Vecna as a new Killer. Players can also access Legendary Outfits for Survivors Nancy Wheeler, Dustin Henderson, and Steve Harrington, resembling Robin Buckley, Eddie Munson, and Jonathan Byers, respectively. Stranger Things Chapter 2 for Dead by Daylight launches on January 27 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam), with the content being available now in the Steam Public Test Build for PC.

#IGN #Gaming #StrangerThings
title: Dead by Daylight x Stranger Things - Official Chapter 2 Release Date Trailer

Players will take to the streets to race for glory, power, or revenge against other factions with an ongoing narrative. PC players can enjoy NVIDIA's DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation, coming to Screamer on March 26 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

description:
Don't miss the ‘RTX: Inside the Game’ Path Tracing and DLSS 4 Reveal Video for Pragmata, an upcoming third-person action-adventure game developed by Capcom. Players will embark on a sci-fi adventure with protagonists Hugh and his android companion, Diana, in unprecedented fidelity courtesy of NVIDIA technology. Make use of the NVIDIA-powered path tracing and DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation in Pragmata, launching on April 24 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

Players can face off in a suite of different modes, from single-player, co-op, or 4v4v4v4 PVP modes, alongside a visual presentation courtesy of DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. Defect is coming soon to PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Gameplay Reveal Trailer for Active Matter, a first-person online multiplayer co-op sci-fi extraction shooter developed by Matter Team. Players can get a look at how NVIDIA technology brings this title to unmatched fidelity with the use of DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation, bringing optimized performance to the battlefield. Active Matter is available now for PC (Gaijin Store), with a release on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and Steam in 2026.

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the ‘RTX: Inside the Game DLSS 4’ Behind The Scenes Video for 007 First Light, a third-person action-adventure origin story for the iconic James Bond developed by IO Interactive. Players can get the rundown on the PC-exclusive enhancements powered by NVIDIA technology from DLSS4 with Multi Frame Generation, volumetric smoke techniques, and more to bring the unique Bond story to life. 007 First Light is launching on May 27 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

description:
Take a look at a new look at the Avengers: Doomsday X-Men teaser trailer for the upcoming MCU film. Get our first look at Professor X, Magneto, and Cyclops for the first time in the MCU portrayed by their Fox-era actors as Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, and James Marsden, respectively.

Avengers: Doomsday opens in theaters on December 18, 2026.

#IGN #AvengersDoomsday #XMen
title: Avengers: Doomsday - Official 'X-Men' Teaser Trailer (2026) Patrick Stewart, James Marsden

author: IGN
description:
After playing the first two chapters of Romeo Is a Dead Man, the latest mad science experiment of an action game helmed by Suda51, it clearly takes some big steps forward in art design and presentation that really raises the “Wow I didn’t see that coming” bar. Even the action, though not revolutionary, feels like a real commitment has been made to evolve the studio’s image from “crazy fun games to watch clips from” to “crazy fun games to spend countless hours with.” Previewed by Jarrett Green

#IGN #Gaming
title: Romeo Is a Dead Man Shows that Suda51 Is Still One Heck of an Auteur

Check out how the NVIDIA 4K Path Tracing and DLSS 4 Multi-Frame Generation will give you the best performance and visuals while you hide from giant creatures and roundhouse kick infected! 

Resident Evil Requiem launches February 27th 2026 for PC (Steam, Epic Games Store), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch 2.

author: IGN
description:
Fighting games are hard, there's no way around it. But the edge of that difficulty can be smoothed a bit with a proper mindset, some universal tips that apply to almost every 2D fighting game, along with a healthy dose of practice and perserverance. If you've always been interested in the genre, but have been intimidated by its learning curve, here are a handful of tips that will help you immediately "git gud" at fighting games. 
Glossary definitions via https://glossary.infil.net/
title: How to Get Good at Fighting Games (The 2D Ones Anyway)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Trailer 2 for Elflock, a third-person action-adventure exploration game developed by NovaSphera Studio. Players will embody a princess in a fairy tale of their creation through actions that alter the narrative as it unfolds. Forge alliances, calm tense political dilemmas, and decide the fate of the kingdom. Elflock is coming soon to PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), with a demo launching in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Elflock - Official Gameplay Trailer 2

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the first 17 minutes of Satisfactory-style gameplay from StarRupture, a first-person open-world base-building game that blends large-scale exploration, complex industrial systems, and intense combat. Set on a hostile, ever-changing alien planet. StarRupture lets players gather and manage resources, construct massive automated bases, and fend off relentless waves of alien creatures – either solo or with friends. This early gameplay shows what to expect from the game’s core systems as it enters Early Access.

Captured on PC in 1440p on Epic graphics settings.
title: StarRupture: First 17 Minutes of Gameplay (Early Access)

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Red Band Trailer for They Will Kill You, an upcoming comedic horror film distributed by Warner Bros. A housekeeper gets thrown in the middle of a sinister plot in a New York City building in They Will Kill You, in theaters on March 27.

A woman takes a job as a housekeeper in a NYC high-rise, unaware of the building's history of disappearances. She soon realizes the community is shrouded in mystery, causing her to survive the night at the Virgil, a demonic cult’s mysterious and twisted death-trap of a lair, before becoming their next offering.

They Will Kill You stars Zazie Beetz, Myha’La, Paterson Joseph, Tom Felton, Heather Graham, Patricia Arquette, and more. The film is directed by Kirill Sokolov alongside being written by Alex Litvak and Kirill Sokolov.

They Will Kill You is in theaters on March 27.
title: They Will Kill You - Official Red Band Trailer (2026) Zazie Beetz, Patricia Arquette
